Posts.Content: Thanks everyone, they were intending in doing Flap surgery but it's spread, so only option for me is chemo, meeting pro cameron on Thursday to get my options. I had every side effect possible and more last time, ended up being admitted after every cycle, then had a double mastectomy and 4 weeks of radio, just doesn't seem fair ... Â  louise
Posts.Title: Cancer has returned after 4 months

Posts.Content: My cancer has returned just 4 months after all my treatment had finished, devastated is an understatement, refusing treatment at the present, I had such a hard time with chemo last year, don't think I can do it again, my family are in bits.... Don't know what to do, it's not them that has to go through it
